title: Launch error :( RADS Error - Could not connect to the HTTP server.
body: Since last night whenever I try to open League of Legends I get this notification -----> **RADS Error - Could not connect to HTTP server. Please check that your internet is enabled and that your firewall is not blocking access.** I don't know how to fix this. I am no expert when it comes to fixing errors on PC so please help me with troubleshooting step-by-step. I am not the only one getting the error my brothers are also having this same problem. Thank you for reading and helping. :)

replies.body: Ya riot still has not fixed this yet, been 2 weeks already. They are loosing millions of players now.

Other people are also getting this error, it may not be an issue on your side. Wait it out a bit and see if it's fixed.

If you really want to try something, here's what we can try. Have you manually set your DNS? Some people are finding that doing this is fixing it for them. Ask if you want to try that. It can be reset afterward, so no risk.
